TopicTitle: [1.12.X] Tantares - Stockalike Soyuz and MIR [16.1][28.05.2024][{Proton Revamp]

Articles.Content:
14 hours ago, Hohmannson said:

It's going to be a processing lab?

Not this, but the 2.5m module will be.



(re: orientation of the internals, I know this is slightly different from irl, this is an intentional choice).

Edited January 25, 2021 by Beale

17 minutes ago, Beale said:

Not this, but the 2.5m module will be.



(re: orientation of the internals, I know this is slightly different from irl, this is an intentional choice).

Wow...just wow cool!
Going to flesh out these IVAs with some new custom props, first off is the bag, which is indeed just a very similar remake of the stock bag prop.

Another small thing I found:
The "Octans Linear RCS Port A + B" do not change colour when you select one in the part menu. Playing on 1.9.1

Just now, chris-kerbal said:

Another small thing I found:
The "Octans Linear RCS Port A + B" do not change colour when you select one in the part menu. Playing on 1.9.1

the other ones do also not change color, but this could be because on the other ones only the stuff without the tubes changes colors, not the rcs tubes itself

31 minutes ago, chris-kerbal said:

Another small thing I found:
The "Octans Linear RCS Port A + B" do not change colour when you select one in the part menu. Playing on 1.9.1

Many thanks! Resolved for next release.

would it be possible to include the Tarsier space technologies plugin in the late Salyut big crew compartment thingys since the description states that there are both telescopes inside?

I gotta say, every time I check the Tantares forums I will never cease to be surprised and wowed. Really looking forward to these station part revamps!

19 hours ago, Invaderchaos said:

I gotta say, every time I check the Tantares forums I will never cease to be surprised and wowed. Really looking forward to these station part revamps!

There once was a man who made  IVAs

It took two days,  what a bore!

He took a bump to the head, and only then he said.

"I guess I'll make seven more!".

There once was a man who made  IVAs

He took a bump to the head, and only then he said.

I think they look just awesome. 

The TKS is mostly IVA'ed by now isn't it? The return capsule always had one, the middle section uses a salyut part (iirc) and only the rear-facing part still needs one.

48 minutes ago, Daniel Prates said:

I think they look just awesome. 

The TKS is mostly IVA'ed by now isn't it? The return capsule always had one, the middle section uses a salyut part (iirc) and only the rear-facing part still needs one.

Unfortunately the Salyut and FGB parts are separate (the current parts look extremely similar though). With these Salyut parts you can make a kind of "muscled up TKS" for sure though. Proper TKS IVA will come though. I'd like all new parts from now to have Ivas

Жил-был человек, который делал IVA

Прошло два дня, какая скука!

Получил шишку по голове, и только потом сказал.

«Думаю, сделаю еще семь!».




And that's very right!!

Some posts have been removed. If you're unhappy with the way a mod is being maintained, don't use it. There's no benefit to berating the person who works on it. 

And if you see a post which you feel is rude, just hit the report button. There's no positive side to berating the person who berated the mod maker, but there is a negative side in that it derails the thread with off-topic posts.

On 1/30/2021 at 11:43 AM, Beale said:

There once was a man who made  IVAs

 

It took two days,  what a bore!

He took a bump to the head, and only then he said.

"I guess I'll make seven more!".

Now has the modder-man come,

He brings mechanics and parts and fun!

One day, with his modellin' done,

He'll lose int'rest and go.

Not that it looks to be happening yet, you've certainly outlasted many. IVAs sound... massively unpleasant to create, and without ever getting that IVA expansion you don't spend a lot of time inside them, but they are oh so wonderful to take in the sights through.

5 minutes ago, RyanRising said:

Now has the modder-man come,

He brings mechanics and parts and fun!

One day, with his modellin' done,

He'll lose int'rest and go.

To fill his shoes, the forums arose,

to make some parts, or write some code!

But stillborn yet those parts were,

an hour after they started.

 

How hard can Blender be?

It's just some cubes and faces and lines.

"Bevel", "Join", pull the green arrow.

The starter cube is all you'll get.

But as it were,

patches written

modules managed

like a herded kitten

 

woe is thee who commits syntax error

unto them comes the late night terror

for though the model may bring delight

the IVA was quite a fright


Tis getting late; my rhymes less jazzy

so I’ll make my exit snazzy

so with that

I bid you adieu,

squash the bugs

throw them in the loo.

 

Lol
